description.value: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Encumbered], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued]. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

publication.title: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
